Question: Once recovered, this person moved to California, keeping Asher as his manager and record producer.
Hints: This person had thoughts of retiring by the time he played the massive Rock in Rio festival in Rio de Janeiro in January 1985.
Gorilla was followed in 1976 by In the Pocket, this person's last studio album to be released under Warner Bros.
The album's Triple Platinum status ties it with Sweet Baby James as this person's all-time biggest selling studio album.
